Limited Time Offerings.name: Classic Burger
Limited Time Offerings.description:
A classic for a reason! Checkers’ & Rally’s Classic Burger is made with our 100% beef hamburger patty
topped with crisp iceberg lettuce, two crinkle-cut pickles, two slices of red onion, ketchup, mustard and
mayonnaise and served on a toasted, sesame seed bun.
Limited Time Offerings.image_url: ./Rally's Delivery Menu _ Order Online _ 4154 Lee Rd Cleveland _ Grubhub_files/dwm7urchxekbfphckkys

All Items.name: Super Loaded Buford
All Items.description:
Take fry-seasoned deliciousness to the next level! Checkers’ & Rally’s Super Loaded Buford is made with
two large 100% beef hamburger patties topped with two slices of melted American cheese, caramelized
onions, crispy onion tanglers, our Famous Seasoned Fries, two strips of crispy bacon, dill pickles,
ketchup, and mayo all served on a toasted, bakery-style bun.

All Items.name: Super Loaded Buford Combo
All Items.description:
Take fry-seasoned deliciousness to the next level! Checkers’ & Rally’s Super Loaded Buford is made with
two large 100% beef hamburger patties topped with two slices of melted American cheese, caramelized
onions, crispy onion tanglers, our Famous Seasoned Fries, two strips of crispy bacon, dill pickles,
ketchup, and mayo all served on a toasted, bakery-style bun.

All Items.name: Unbeatable Meal Deal
All Items.description:
Checkers’ & Rally’s newest Unbeatable Meal Deal  now includes all things you crave :

Your choice of sandwich: Cheese Double, with more than a quarter-pound of meat or
Spicy Chicken Sandwich
• a value-sized order of our Famous Seasoned Fries
• a 12 oz. icy cold soft drink
• AND a cinnamon Apple Pie
